name: In Gunt Company
description:
Guide the Gunter the cockatiel in his pursuit of love. Perfect the art of bird courtship to gain the hearts of inanimate objects (and maybe another cockatiel). Unlock all the endings for a special surprise!

Learn more about Gunter (and his friends) by visiting our tumblr and youtube pages.

Pronunciation Guide
Gunter - Goon-tah
Gunt - Goont

P.S. If you're finding yourself a lone gunt again and again, try paying attention to how the objects/bird react when your court them. 3 positive courting behaviors is all you need to gain their love!
